SqlServer.Query: SELECT CASE WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda LIKE 'HK%' THEN REPLACE(r.rst_cod_tienda, 'HK', 'H0') WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'CA02' THEN 'CA002' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V001' THEN 'JV001' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V003' THEN 'JV003' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V004' THEN 'JV004' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V005' THEN 'JV005' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V006' THEN 'JV006' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V007' THEN 'JV007' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V008' THEN 'JV008' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V009' THEN 'JV009' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V010' THEN 'JV010' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V012' THEN 'JV012' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V013' THEN 'JV013' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V014' THEN 'JV014' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V015' THEN 'JV015' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V016' THEN 'JV016' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V018' THEN 'JV018' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V019' THEN 'JV019' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V021' THEN 'JV021' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V022' THEN 'JV022' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V023' THEN 'JV023' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V024' THEN 'JV024' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V026' THEN 'JV026' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V027' THEN 'JV027' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V029' THEN 'JV029' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V031' THEN 'JV031' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V032' THEN 'JV032' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V034' THEN 'JV034' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V035' THEN 'JV035' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V036' THEN 'JV036' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V037' THEN 'JV037' ELSE r.rst_cod_tienda END AS clientId, CASE WHEN LEFT(rcd.variableV, CHARINDEX(':', rcd.variableV) - 1) = '172.17.0.24' THEN '10.101.24.20' WHEN LEFT(rcd.variableV, CHARINDEX(':', rcd.variableV) - 1) = '172.17.0.29' THEN '10.106.3.20' WHEN LEFT(rcd.variableV, CHARINDEX(':', rcd.variableV) - 1) = '192.168.100.148' THEN '10.115.9.20' ELSE  CONCAT(LEFT(rcd.variableV, CHARINDEX(':', rcd.variableV) - 1),'') END AS servidor,  CONCAT('MAXPOINT_',  CASE WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda LIKE 'HK%' THEN REPLACE(r.rst_cod_tienda, 'HK', 'H0') WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'CA02' THEN 'CA002' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V001' THEN 'JV001' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V003' THEN 'JV003' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V004' THEN 'JV004' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V005' THEN 'JV005' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V006' THEN 'JV006' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V007' THEN 'JV007' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V008' THEN 'JV008' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V009' THEN 'JV009' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V010' THEN 'JV010' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V012' THEN 'JV012' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V013' THEN 'JV013' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V014' THEN 'JV014' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V015' THEN 'JV015' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V016' THEN 'JV016' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V018' THEN 'JV018' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V019' THEN 'JV019' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V021' THEN 'JV021' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V022' THEN 'JV022' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V023' THEN 'JV023' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V024' THEN 'JV024' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V026' THEN 'JV026' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V027' THEN 'JV027' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V029' THEN 'JV029' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V031' THEN 'JV031' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V032' THEN 'JV032' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V034' THEN 'JV034' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V035' THEN 'JV035' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V036' THEN 'JV036' WHEN r.rst_cod_tienda = 'V037' THEN 'JV037' ELSE r.rst_cod_tienda END ) AS repository,  'sis_despliegue' AS [user],  '81Nb1852g7@YP3t' AS password  FROM RestauranteColeccionDeDatos rcd  INNER JOIN Restaurante r ON r.rst_id=rcd.rst_id  INNER JOIN Cadena c ON c.cdn_id=r.cdn_id INNER JOIN ColeccionRestaurante cr ON cr.cdn_id=c.cdn_id AND cr.ID_ColeccionRestaurante=rcd.ID_ColeccionRestaurante WHERE rcd.variableV LIKE '%:880' AND r.IDStatus = config.fn_estado('Restaurante', 'Activo') GROUP BY r.rst_cod_tienda, rcd.variableV, r.rst_cod_tienda ORDER BY r.rst_cod_tienda
